title: Intuvia 100 cockpit
description: The Intuvia 100 display is simple and intuitive to use and offers a perfect overview of key riding data, including distance, trip duration, range, speed and riding mode. The Intuvia 100 also provides precise information on the battery charge level as a percentage. It can be conveniently operated using the LED Remote on the handlebars..
